com.redhat.rhn.frontend.listview

Class ListControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.listview.ListControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PageControl

    public class ListControl
extends java.lang.Object
    ListControl ListControl is the basic method of control for a list of dataresults to be shown with the ListDisplayTag. It provides filtering and indexing mechanisms for showing data.

      • filterData

        public void filterData(DataResult dr)
        Restrict the data that is in the list so that it matches the requested data. Uses customFilter for filtering if a ListFilter was provided
        Parameters:
        dr - DataResult to filter
